title: Retributi- Hey Uhh, Did You Like Actually Learn To Revive People? Like No Offense, You Don't Seem Very Good At It

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Revive a player at night. 3 uses.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You may only target Town.
- The person you revive will be attacked automatically at the end of the next night. Nothing can prevent them from dying again, and you will continuously attack them at the beginning and end of every phase until they die.
